name: BSO
comment:
>>37766874

No noise from inside, and it's about two minutes before he returns, walking cautiously.

"Find anything, kid?" Vision asks.

"Nah..." He pauses, his voice breathy, and face a bit flush. A deep breath, hand pressed against his chest. "Just an empty chest. The door was open, right? I think the guys outside beat us to it. It's like, a library, maybe? There's some books and stuff, but they're all washed out..."

"You sure about that?" The gunner frowns.

> Suggest you get ready to take on the boss.
> Suggest investigating this room.
> Suggest meeting the others outside.
> Other.
